price: Sālih said, “This is a she-camel[18]; she will have her share of water and you will have yours, each on a specified day.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: [18] That was miraculously sent to them as a sign by Allah.
